#summary Examples of using pyactivemq.

= Sending pickled Python objects =

This example shows how to send pickled Python objects (in this case, [http://www.scipy.org/ NumPy] arrays).

[http://pyactivemq.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/examples/numpypickle.py]

= Asynchronous message listener =

The latest code in trunk (added after pyactivemq 0.0.2 was released) supports asynchronous message listeners.

[http://pyactivemq.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/src/examples/asynclistener.py]
